message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $950000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something closer to $980000.  It's a fair price considering the value of the product for you. Let's split the difference and make this deal work.
